casebody.data:
Gottfred LINE, Libelant-Appellant, v. Steamship STAVANGAREN, her engines, etc.; M. L. Lavik, Claimant-Appellee. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 7, 1924.) No. 326. Silas B. Axtell, of New York City, for appellant. James A. Hatch, of New York City (John Tilney Carpenter and Rumsey & Morgan, all of New York City, of counsel), for re« spondent.

Before ROGERS, HOUGH, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
